summary.purpose: Provides a versatile Button component with multiple visual variants and sizes, supporting both standard button elements and polymorphic rendering through Radix UI's Slot mechanism.
summary.problem_solved: Offers a reusable, accessible button component with configurable variants (default, destructive, outline, secondary, ghost, link) and sizes (default, sm, lg, icon) for consistent button behavior across the application.

external.name: @radix-ui/react-slot
external.why_used: Provides the Slot component for polymorphic rendering. Allows Button to render as different elements (e.g., a, Link) when asChild prop is true while preserving styling and event handlers.

external.name: class-variance-authority
external.why_used: CVA library for managing button variant styles. Defines 6 variant styles and 4 size presets with proper TypeScript support.

external.name: react
external.why_used: Core React library for component creation, forwardRef, JSX rendering, and props typing

internal.why_used: Provides the cn() utility function for conditionally merging CSS classes and button variant classes

details.what_it_does: Extends React ButtonHTMLAttributes<HTMLButtonElement> with VariantProps from CVA buttonVariants and an asChild boolean prop. Allows consumers to pass standard button attributes plus button-specific styling options and polymorphic rendering control.

symbols.name: buttonVariants
symbols.description_one_line: CVA variant configuration defining all button styling variants and size presets

returns.description: CVA variant function that returns CSS classes based on variant and size props

details.what_it_does: CVA configuration that defines button base styles and 10 variant/size combinations. Base styles include inline-flex layout, centered content with gap, whitespace handling, rounded corners, small text, medium font weight, smooth transitions, disabled state styling, SVG sizing, outline focus states, and focus-visible ring styling. Includes 6 variants: 'default' (primary blue), 'destructive' (red), 'outline' (bordered), 'secondary' (secondary color), 'ghost' (no background), 'link' (text with underline). Includes 4 sizes: 'default' (h-9 with standard padding), 'sm' (smaller with less padding), 'lg' (larger), 'icon' (square for icon-only buttons).

minimal_correct.title: Using buttonVariants directly

extensive_correct.title: All button variants and sizes

incorrect.title: Incorrect: Invalid variant or size
incorrect.code:
buttonVariants({ variant: 'primary' }); // 'primary' doesn't exist
buttonVariants({ size: 'xl' }); // 'xl' doesn't exist
incorrect.why_incorrect: buttonVariants only accepts specific variant and size values. 'primary' should be 'default', and there's no 'xl' size. TypeScript will prevent invalid values at compile time.

symbols.name: Button
symbols.description_one_line: Styled button component with forwardRef support, variant/size options, and polymorphic rendering via Radix Slot

params.name: className
params.description: Optional CSS classes to merge with button variant styles using cn() utility

params.name: variant
params.description: Visual variant style. 'default' is primary blue, 'destructive' is red warning, 'outline' is bordered, 'secondary' uses secondary color, 'ghost' has no background, 'link' is text-only with underline. Defaults to 'default'.

params.name: size
params.description: Button size preset. 'default' is standard height/padding, 'sm' is smaller, 'lg' is larger, 'icon' is square for icon-only buttons. Defaults to 'default'.

params.name: asChild
params.description: When true, renders the button styles on the direct child element instead of creating a button element. Enables polymorphic rendering (e.g., rendering as an <a> or Next.js Link). Defaults to false.

params.name: ...props
params.description: Standard HTML button attributes (onClick, disabled, aria-label, data-*, etc.)

returns.description: A styled button element (or other element if asChild=true) with variant/size classes and content

details.what_it_does: Renders a button element using buttonVariants for the specified variant and size. Implements forwardRef to expose the underlying button element ref to parent components. Conditionally renders as Slot (when asChild=true) or native button (when asChild=false). Merges variant classes with any additional className prop using cn(). Sets data-slot='button' attribute for CSS targeting. Accepts all standard HTML button attributes.
details.rendered_ui_description: An inline-flex button with rounded corners and optimized typography. Appearance depends on variant: default shows primary blue background with shadow and gray hover state, destructive shows red with dark hover, outline shows border only, secondary shows secondary color, ghost shows background only on hover, link shows underlined text. All variants support disabled state (opacity reduction) and focus ring styling. Automatically sizes SVG icons inside to 4 units unless they have explicit size classes.

minimal_correct.title: Basic button with default variant

extensive_correct.title: All button variants and sizes with different states

incorrect.title: Incorrect: Mixing variant/size or forgetting asChild
incorrect.why_incorrect: Button variants must be one of the defined 6 options. When using asChild=true, you must provide a child element that becomes the button container. Invalid sizes will not apply any size styling.
